reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The Youth ICT Empowerment Project is designed to improve the employability of disadvantaged youth in Tanzania. The project has two key components. First, the training component entails computer-based employability training and internships for unemployed yo uth, as well as entrepreneurial training and assistance in youth enterprise development. The training focuses on life skills, ICT and job search techniques. Second, the project entails the development of an internet portal for youth (www.viljanatz.com) whi ch offers free digital educational material, for instance an online radio and a job mediation service for youth and employers. Themes addressed in the educational material will include family planning, disease prevention and gender education.
